sentences.sentence: "He wanted to make it look more complete," suggests Coptic expert Gregor Wurst, who is helping to restore it.
sentences.translation: “他想让它们看起来更复杂些，”科普特文专家Gregor Wurst猜测说，他正在帮助修复这些书页。

sentences.sentence: Company Texda Textildarm Ltd which is producing the World Cup 'Wurst' has produced sausages for each country in the tournament and say they will soon begin exporting them abroad.
sentences.translation: 生产这种世界杯“腊肠”的德国Texda Textildarm有限公司还将为参加世界杯的每一支队伍都生产这样的腊肠。该公司表示，这些腊肠很快将开始出口。
